history.narrative: Law 16-95, the “Uniform Environmental Covenants Act of 2005”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-147 which was referred to the Committee on Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 4, 2006, and February 7, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 27, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-290 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-95 became effective on May 12, 2006.
